titleStmt.title: Lillys strange and wonderful prognostication being a relation of many universal accidents that will come to pass in this year, 1681, according to the significations of the celestial bodies, as well in this our English nation, as in parts beyond the seas : with a sober caution to all by speedy repentance to avert the judgments that are impendent.
titleStmt.author: Lilly, William, 1602-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Reprinted for George Foster and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
Attributed to William Lilly. cf. NUC pre-1956.
